head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths DEICH, HELEN (NEE GELLER

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths DEICH, HELEN (NEE GELLER

block.p: DEICH--Helen (nee Geller), age 95. Wife of the late Samuel R. Deich, M.D.; mother of Rita Brassart of Wayne, and Judith Deich of New York City; sister of Bernice Feldman of Englewood, and the late Selma Mottus. Graveside service 3pm, Sunday January 27. For further information please call Robert Schoem's Menorah Chapel, 201-843-9090.
